headerSubtitle: Crafting beautiful, performant mobile experiences with Flutter
aboutParagraph1: I am a professional Flutter developer with expertise in building high-performance, visually stunning cross-platform applications. I specialize in creating seamless user experiences with Flutter's powerful UI toolkit.
aboutParagraph2: With a strong understanding of Dart and Flutter architecture, I develop applications that run smoothly on multiple platforms while maintaining native performance and appearance. My approach focuses on clean code, responsive design, and performance optimization.
aboutParagraph3: I am passionate about keeping up with the latest Flutter updates and best practices to deliver cutting-edge solutions for my clients and collaborators.
skillsSubtitle: Specializing in Flutter development with expertise in building beautiful, performant, and responsive applications
projectsSubtitle: Showcasing my expertise in Flutter development through real-world applications
contactSubtitle: Have a project in mind? Let's work together!
flutterSpecialText: Specializing in Flutter development with expertise in building beautiful, performant, and responsive applications

aboutText2: With a strong understanding of Dart and Flutter architecture, I develop applications that run smoothly on multiple platforms while maintaining native performance and appearance. My approach focuses on clean code, responsive design, and performance optimization.

eCommerceAppDesc: A cross-platform eCommerce application built with Flutter, featuring product listings, cart management, and secure payment processing.
socialAppDesc: A social networking application built with Flutter featuring real-time chat, post sharing, and interactive user profiles.
foodDeliveryDesc: A food delivery application built with Flutter featuring restaurant discovery, menu browsing, order tracking, and payment integration.
featureResponsiveUI: Responsive UI for mobile and tablet
